  • Constructor Details

    • TeacherQuestionBankController

      public TeacherQuestionBankController()

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the question table filter. All text fields in question table filter is set to empty. All combo boxes in question table filter is set to "all". This method is called when "Reset" button in question table filter is clicked

    • filter

      public void filter()
      Filter the question table based on the text fields and combo boxes input in question table filter. Empty text field or Combo box set to "all" would not be used in filtering. If score text field in question table filter is not an integer, an error message dialog is prompted and filtering is terminated. After filtering, all question in question table is deselected and the question form is cleared. This method is called when "Filter" button in question table filter is clicked

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refresh the question table by reloading the question data from question database. After refreshing, all question in question table is deselected and the question form is cleared. This method is called when "Refresh" button in exam table filter is clicked

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Delete the selected question from question table. After successful deletion, the question table is refreshed, all question in question table is deselected and the question form is cleared. If any error occurred, the operation is terminated with error message dialog prompted. If any exam contains the deleting question, a warning dialog is prompted to notify affected exam. If the user click "OK" in the warning dialog, all affected exam will delete the question as well while deleting those exam containing only th deleted question; else, the operation terminated. This method is called when "Delete" button is clicked

    • deleteQuestion

      private void deleteQuestion(boolean deleteExam)
      Delete the selected question from question table. After successful deletion, the question table is refreshed, all question in question table is deselected and the question form is cleared. If any error occurred, the operation is terminated with error message dialog prompted. If any exam contains the deleting question and deleteExam is false, a warning dialog is prompted to notify affected exam; else, all affected exam will delete the question as well while deleting those exam containing only th deleted question.

    • update

      public void update()
      Update the selected question in question table. After successful updating, a notification dialog is popped up and the exam table is refreshed. If any error occurred, the update operation is terminated with error message prompted in dialog. This method is called when "Update" button in question input form is clicked

    • add

      public void add()
      Create a question in question table and save to the database. After successful creation, a notification dialog is popped up and the question table is refreshed. If any error occurred, the creation operation is terminated with error message prompted in dialog. This method is called when "Add" button in question input form is clicked

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize the QuestionBank UI for teacher
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • markEmptyCell

      private String markEmptyCell(String s)
      Check if the attribute is empty and return "---" if so to represent empty cell
      Parameters:
      s - String for checking
      Returns:
      Marked string

    • initQuestionTable

      private void initQuestionTable()
      Set up the question table, including:
    • Set the value of each columns to link with corresponding attribute from Question entity
    • Fill in the question form automatically based on the row (question entity) selected
    • Enable or disable the "Update" and "Delete" button automatically by checking if any row selected

    • initQuestionFilter

      private void initQuestionFilter()
      Initialize the question filter by setting up the combo boxes selections

    • initQuestionForm

      private void initQuestionForm()
      Initialize the question input form by setting up the combo boxes selections When the selection changed, save the options for current type and retrieved the options saved for the type selected.

    • resetQuestionForm

      private void resetQuestionForm()
      Reset the question input form by setting all text field to empty and combo boxes to "all"

    • refreshQuestionTable

      private void refreshQuestionTable()
      Refresh and filter the question table based on the field in question filter. Empty text field or Combo box set to "all" would not be used in filtering. If score text field in question table filter is not an integer, an error message dialog is prompted and filtering is terminated. After refreshing, all selected question is deselected and question form is reset.

    • setUpFormByType

      private void setUpFormByType(String type)
      Set up the option text field in question form according to the type selected.
      Parameters:
      type - Question type selected by user

    • saveOptions

      private void saveOptions(String type)
      Save the option that user input for the current question and retrieved when the type is reselected
      Parameters:
      type - Question type selected by user

    • clearSelectedQuestion

      private void clearSelectedQuestion()
      Clear the selection in question table and disable the "Update" and "Delete" button.
